TopicTitle: Hooligan Labs Status Updates and Bug Tracker Thread

Articles.Content:
Ok so I am making this thread to show what I have been working on for the HL mods recently as well as to keep track of and report on any bugs that are found.

So here goes:

Work in progress:

Working on new set of airship/sub parts designed to be modular and (hopefully) work better with FAR.

Bug Tracker:

Weird bug with the heavy SQUID landing legs causing them to "eject" the lower half when you extend them. STATUS: Tracking it down.
Nice work on the new parts. That bug is indeed weird and I still haven't figured out what to do to fix it. Grrrr

Nice work on the new parts. That bug is indeed weird and I still haven't figured out what to do to fix it. Grrrr

Thanks. The new parts are 2.5m at the widest and 1.25m along their short side. The hubs on the first and second picture are also 1.25m and perfect for docking ports, mounting engines, or anything else really.
Ok so I have added in a poll for those who want to give their opinion on what size I should make these new modular parts.
New testing parts now available here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/wu8944djfvk6jqp/HL%20Airship%20Test%20Parts.zip
